DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether prescription determine new daily disposable toric contact lens good match prescription determine exist brand lens .
DOC.brief_title: Non-dispensing Study Check Prescription Equivalence Two Daily Disposable Toric Contact Lens Types
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must 18 40 year old . 2 . The subject must normal eye . 3 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 4 . The subject must read sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT provide copy form . 5 . The subject must subjective distance spectacle prescription range 1.75 5.00 DS eye . 6 . The subject must manifest 1.25 2.00 D refractive astigmatism eye . 7 . The subject 's refractive cylinder axis must 180 +/ 30 eye . 8 . The subject must adapt wearer soft toric contact lenses eye . 9 . The subject 's best visual acuity ( BVA ) must better equal 20/25 eye . 10 . Subjects must already possess wearable pair spectacle . 1 . Ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . 2 . Systemic disease autoimmune disease use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Clinically significant corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal stain abnormality cornea , may contraindicate contact lens wear . 4 . Clinically significant tarsal abnormality might interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Any ocular infection . 6 . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 7 . Pregnancy lactation 8 . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . 9 . Diabetes 10 . Strabismus
